mapper.select: SELECT A.BOOK_NO, B.BOOK_NAME, C.BOOK_IMAGE_COVER, A.AMOUNT FROM ( SELECT B.BOOK_NO, SUM(B.COUNT) AS AMOUNT FROM BUY A JOIN BUY_BOOK B ON A.BUY_NO = B.BUY_NO GROUP BY B.BOOK_NO ) AS A JOIN BOOK B ON A.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO JOIN BOOK_IMAGES C ON B.BOOK_NO = C.BOOK_NO ORDER BY A.AMOUNT DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT A.BOOK_NO, A.BOOK_NAME, B.BOOK_IMAGE_COVER FROM BOOK A JOIN BOOK_IMAGES B ON A.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO WHERE BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) LIMIT 8

SELECT A.BOOK_NO, A.BOOK_NAME, MAX(B.BOOK_IMAGE_COVER) AS BOOK_IMAGE_COVER FROM BOOK A JOIN BOOK_IMAGES B ON A.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO WHERE BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY A.BOOK_NO, A.BOOK_NAME LIMIT 8

SELECT A.BOOK_NO, A.BOOK_NAME, B.BOOK_IMAGE_COVER, SUM(A.BOOK_VIEW_COUNT) AS TOTAL_VIEW_COUNT FROM BOOK A JOIN BOOK_IMAGES B ON A.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO GROUP BY A.BOOK_NO, A.BOOK_NAME, B.BOOK_IMAGE_COVER ORDER BY TOTAL_VIEW_COUNT DESC LIMIT 10
